title: What's the difference between an interrupt line and the interrupt number
content: What's the difference between an interrupt line and an interrupt number (like 0x80) ? Also how are IRQs related to syscalls?

comments.text: I'll leave the answering to someone else, but do yourself a HUGE favor and spend some time rummaging through chapter 6 in vol. 3a of the Intel developer's manual. It's an amazing resource for this topic: intel.com/content/www/us/en/architecture-and-technology/â€¦
